article:
All India Are-Katika Marriage Bureau presents Vivaha parichaya for brides and grooms of Are-Katika at 10th Feb 3PM at Shree Sunama Jakini Temple, Gooty. Free registration. Contact 9494131647 or 9880659432 for more details

Click here to know more.

Donors interested in making donations towards Shree Sunama Jakini Maatha Temple are requested to make NEFT/IMPS transfer to the below mentioned account.

Shree Sunama Jakini Temple Development Association - Gooty
State Bank of India - Gooty Branch
A/c No. 11449336473
IFSC Code : SBIN0000976

Click here to know more.
